```{python}
#| output: false
import sys
import os
sys.path.append(os.path.abspath('src/jaxidem'))
import jax
jax.config.update('jax_platform_name', 'cpu')
import utilities
import idem
from utilities import *
from idem import *
import warnings
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

seed = 4
key = jax.random.PRNGKey(seed)
keys = rand.split(key, 10)

process_basis = place_cosine_basis(N = 30)
#process_basis = place_basis()

#Sigma_eta = jnp.diag(0.1*jnp.arange(process_basis.nbasis, dtype="float32"))
#Sigma_eta = jnp.diag(rand.normal(key, shape=(process_basis.nbasis,))**2)
Sigma_eta = jnp.diag((0.01*jnp.ones(process_basis.nbasis)).at[1].set(40.0).at[30].set(80.0).at[31].set(60.0))

model = gen_example_idem(keys[0], k_spat_inv=False, ngrid=jnp.array([40, 40]), process_basis = process_basis, Sigma_eta = Sigma_eta)

# Simulation
T = 35
alpha_0 = jnp.ones(process_basis.nbasis)#.at[1].set(30.0).at[0].set(15.0)
process_data, obs_data = model.simulate(keys[1], T=T, nobs=50,alpha_0=alpha_0)

dpi = 200
width = 576 / dpi
height = 480 / dpi

# plot the objects
gif_st_grid(process_data, "site/process.gif", width=width, height=height)
gif_st_pts(obs_data, "site/obs.gif", width=width, height=height)
model.kernel.save_plot("site/kernel.png", width=width, height=height)
 
from PIL import Image, ImageSequence

gif1 = Image.open('site/process.gif')
gif2 = Image.open('site/tardis.gif')

width, height = gif1.size

frames = []
num_frames_gif1 = len(list(ImageSequence.Iterator(gif1)))
num_frames_gif2 = len(list(ImageSequence.Iterator(gif2)))
max_frames = max(num_frames_gif1, num_frames_gif2)

for i in range(max_frames):
    frame1 = ImageSequence.Iterator(gif1)[i % num_frames_gif1].convert("RGBA")
    frame2 = ImageSequence.Iterator(gif2)[i % num_frames_gif2].convert("RGBA")

    frame2 = frame2.resize((width, height), Image.LANCZOS)
    
    combined = Image.alpha_composite(frame1, frame2)
    frames.append(combined)


frames[0].save('site/process.gif', save_all=True, append_images=frames[1:], duration=gif1.info['duration'], loop=0)

```
